item.title: As everything changes over time
item.description: When I look back to how life was some years ago, I can’t believe how much things have changed and, most important, what that change means. I have realized that we often see change as something bad, perhaps because it is the traditional way to think about it. Still, change can mean much more than that, you learn about the past, about how things were, and that is what really matters.

item.title: First steps in Web Development
item.description: Probably you have wondered at some point in your life, what is web development? (Or not haha). Here I will give a short introduction to what it is and why it is so important nowadays. Web development, also known as website development, includes all the tasks associated with developing websites for hosting via the internet. Web development can go from creating a simple static page to a complex web application, it will depend on the software complexity of the code.
